summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of the Alley in Block 79, Replat of West Seattle Land and Improvement Co's Third Plat, being the alley between Grayson Street and Admiral Way from 39th Avenue Southwest to Belvidere Avenue, and certain other streets, avenues, and alleys, by paving, constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6063, and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof; and repealing Ordinance No. 82859.
committee: Finance, Streets and Sewers and City Utilities
